December 5, 2018 - Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Pittsburgh, PA, 4moms designs and develops better-for-baby and easier-for-parents products through the use of advanced robotics. The company’s products are sold in major retailers and select specialty stores in the U.S. such as Amazon, Best Buy, buybuy Baby, and Target, and have distribution in over 50 countries worldwide.
